description: PodExecOptions is the query options to a Pod's remote exec call.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

command.description: The remote command to execute; argv array; not executed within a shell.

container.description: Container in which to execute the command

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

stderr.description: This indicates that stderr is to be redirected for the exec call

stdin.description: This indicates that stdin is to be redirected for the exec call

stdout.description: This indicates that stdout is to be redirected for the exec call

tty.description: This indicates that a TTY will be allocated for the exec call
